original_text: The priest is to wave the two lambs before the Lord as a wave offering, together with the bread of the firstfruits. They are a sacred offering to the Lord for the priest.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 첫 이삭의 떡과 함께 그 두 마리 어린 양을 여호와 앞에 흔들어서 요제를 삼을 것이요 이것들은 여호와께 드리는 성물이니 제사장에게 돌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: The priest is to wave the two lambs
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 두 마리의 어린 양을 흔들어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: before the Lord as a wave offering
together with the bread of the firstfruits
to the Lord for the priest
